name: Ashwagandha Powder 100g
description: Recharge Your Body & Mind with Ancient Ayurvedic Wisdom
Our Ashwagandha Powder is made from premium-grade, sun-dried ashwagandha roots, finely ground to preserve all their adaptogenic properties.
Ashwagandha (Withania somnifera) is one of the most powerful herbs in Ayurveda, known for reducing stress, boosting energy, improving mental focus, and enhancing physical strength.
Whether you're an athlete, working professional, or simply someone seeking natural wellness, this herb is your go-to daily rejuvenator.
Mix 1 tsp with warm water, milk, honey, or in smoothies and consume regularly for visible benefits.
highlights: Pure & Natural Root Powder | Stress Relief | Energy & Immunity Booster | No Additives & Preservatives
benefits: Reduces Stress & Anxiety – A powerful adaptogen that helps balance cortisol and promote calmness.
Boosts Energy & Stamina – Enhances physical strength and endurance naturally.
Supports Immunity & Vitality – Strengthens immune system and supports overall wellness.

name: Raw Flax Seeds 400g
description: Fuel your body with the goodness of nature with RAWHERB Premium Raw Flax Seeds – a powerhouse of plant-based nutrition.
Packed with Omega-3 fatty acids, dietary fibre, and plant protein, our flax seeds are carefully sourced and hygienically packed to retain maximum freshness and purity.
These versatile seeds help support weight management, improve digestion, and promote healthy hair and glowing skin.
Perfect for daily use, flax seeds easily fit into any diet and lifestyle.
Sprinkle them on smoothies, salads, yogurt, cereals, or use them in baking and cooking for a healthy nutritional upgrade.
highlights: Rich in Omega-3 | High Fibre Superfood | Supports Digestion & Weight Management | No Additives or Preservatives
benefits: Supports Heart Health – Rich in Omega-3 fatty acids that help maintain healthy cholesterol levels.
Aids Digestion & Weight Management – High fibre content promotes gut health and keeps you feeling fuller for longer.
Enhances Hair & Skin Health – Nourishes from within with essential nutrients and antioxidants.

name: Rawherb Gokshura Powder 100g
description: Rawherb Gokshura Powder is a 100% natural and pure herbal supplement made from the finest Tribulus Terrestris — an ancient Ayurvedic herb known for promoting vitality, stamina, and energy.
Traditionally used in Ayurveda as a natural rejuvenator and strength enhancer, Gokshura supports muscle health, hormonal balance, and endurance in both men and women.
Our Gokshura powder is sun-dried, finely ground, and chemical-free, preserving its full potency and nutrients.
Regular use may help improve physical strength, boost performance, and support overall energy levels.
Ideal for athletes, active individuals, and anyone seeking to enhance natural vitality.
highlights: Pure Tribulus Terrestris | Energy & Stamina Booster | Supports Muscle & Hormonal Health | No Additives or Preservatives
benefits: Boosts Energy & Endurance – Helps promote natural stamina and physical performance.
Supports Vitality & Hormonal Balance – Traditionally used to support male vitality and overall hormonal health.
Aids Muscle Strength & Recovery – Supports muscle growth and post-workout recovery naturally.
Supports Urinary & Kidney Health – Helps maintain healthy urinary system function.

name: Rawherb Organic Chia Seeds 400g
description: Unlock the power of nature with RAWHERB Chia Seeds – a nutrient-dense superfood sourced from trusted farms.
Packed with plant-based protein, dietary fiber, and essential Omega-3 fatty acids, these seeds help boost daily nutrition naturally.
Completely raw, unprocessed, and gluten-free, chia seeds support heart health, digestion, and sustained energy.
Their mild taste and crunchy texture make them easy to add to smoothies, overnight oats, salads, and baking recipes.
Perfect for health-conscious individuals following keto, vegan, or plant-based diets.
highlights: Rich in Omega-3 & Fibre | Plant-Based Protein | Supports Digestion & Heart Health | Raw & Unprocessed
benefits: Supports Heart Health – Omega-3 fatty acids help maintain healthy cholesterol levels.
Aids Digestion & Weight Management – High fiber content promotes gut health and keeps you fuller for longer.
Boosts Energy & Nutrition – Provides sustained energy with essential nutrients.
Ideal for Special Diets – Suitable for keto, vegan, and plant-based lifestyles.

name: Rawherb Organic Moringa Powder 200g
description: RAWHERB Moringa Powder is a natural substitute for multivitamin tablets, made from shade-dried Moringa oleifera leaves — known as the “Miracle Tree” for its exceptional nutrient profile.
Packed with plant-based vitamins, minerals, protein, and antioxidants, it is a powerful green superfood that supports overall daily wellness.
Regular use helps boost immunity, improve energy and stamina, promote healthy digestion, and support natural detox and weight management.
Our moringa powder is carefully processed to retain maximum nutrients without any chemicals or additives.
An ideal daily supplement for anyone seeking clean, plant-based nutrition.
highlights: Superfood for Immunity & Energy | Natural Multivitamin Alternative | Supports Detox & Digestion | No Additives or Fillers
benefits: Plant-Based Nutrition – Rich in Vitamin A, Vitamin C, Calcium, and plant protein.
Boosts Energy Naturally – High in iron and B-vitamins to support stamina and vitality.
Supports Immunity & Digestion – Packed with antioxidants and dietary fiber.
Natural Detox & Cleanse – Helps support metabolism and gut health.

name: Rawherb Premium Shatavari Powder 100g
description: Nurture your wellness naturally with Rawherb Shatavari Powder, made from carefully selected Asparagus racemosus roots.
Gently sun-dried and finely milled to preserve its natural goodness, shatavari is traditionally valued in Ayurveda as a women’s rejuvenating herb.
It is known for supporting hormonal balance, vitality, and overall reproductive wellness.
Rawherb Shatavari Powder is 100% pure, plant-based, and free from additives, preservatives, or artificial colours.
Easily mix with warm milk, smoothies, or herbal tea for daily nourishment.
highlights: Pure Asparagus racemosus | Supports Women’s Wellness | Hormonal Balance & Vitality | No Additives or Preservatives
benefits: Supports Women’s Wellness – Traditionally used to help maintain hormonal balance and reproductive health.
Boosts Vitality & Stamina – Helps support overall strength, endurance, and energy levels.
Clean & Plant-Based Nutrition – Free from additives, artificial colours, flavours, or preservatives.
Easy Daily Use – Mix ½–1 tsp with milk, smoothies, or herbal tea for daily nourishment.

name: Rawherb Rosemary Leaves 100g
description: RAWHERB Rosemary Leaves are carefully dried to preserve their natural aroma, flavor, and essential oils, sourced from premium quality rosemary plants.
Traditionally used for hair care, rosemary helps promote scalp health, strengthen hair roots, and reduce dandruff.
These versatile leaves are suitable for both culinary and wellness uses.
Add them to soups, stews, roasted vegetables, meats, marinades, or brew into herbal teas for a refreshing, earthy flavor.
100% natural and free from additives, preservatives, and artificial colors — perfect for your kitchen or herbal pantry.
highlights: Premium Sun-Dried Leaves | Cooking & Hair Care Use | Aromatic Culinary Herb | No Additives or Preservatives
benefits: Supports Hair & Scalp Health – Traditionally used in DIY hair oils and rinses to help reduce dandruff, improve circulation, and strengthen roots.
Dual Purpose – Cooking & Hair Care – Ideal for enhancing food flavor or preparing hair rinses and infused oils.
Aromatic Culinary Herb – Adds earthy, pine-like flavor to soups, stews, roasts, marinades, and herbal teas.
Hygienically Packed for Freshness – Resealable pouch preserves aroma, flavor, and quality for long-term use.

name: Musli Powder 100gm
description: RAWHERB Safed Musli Powder (Chlorophytum borivilianum) is a 100% natural and pure herbal supplement crafted to support energy, stamina, and overall vitality.
Known in Ayurveda as a powerful adaptogen, Safed Musli is traditionally used as a natural rejuvenator that helps restore strength and wellness.
Sourced from carefully selected roots, our Safed Musli powder is free from preservatives, additives, and artificial flavors.
Naturally vegan and gluten-free, it fits perfectly into modern wellness and lifestyle routines.
An ideal daily supplement for those seeking improved stamina, immunity, and overall well-being.
highlights: Pure Safed Musli Root | Energy & Stamina Booster | Supports Vitality & Wellness | No Additives or Preservatives
benefits: Supports Energy & Stamina – Traditionally used as a natural strength and endurance booster.
Promotes Vitality & Rejuvenation – Helps restore physical strength and overall wellness.
Clean & Herbal Supplement – Free from fillers, chemicals, and artificial flavors.
